item.title: Merciless Village is looking for ninjas
item.content:encoded:
Merciless has come a long way from being a non-Epic village with less than 30 villagers. We're now Epic, have 100 upgrades and the number is rising, we're going R00t as soon as we defeat the two Demons, and bonuses including +80 stamina and all the Academies. Our village has access to Monochromes, BurgerNinja, Robofight and if you didn't know, Epic Monument allows you to become a sannin.

We're also summoning monsters as much as possible (=when we have enough resources), hoping to run into those Demons ASAP.

New players are most welcomed along with everyone else, and we will help you in every way possible so you could become a strong character in this game.

So in general: if you're looking for a good village with nice bonuses and friendly people (and possibly shinies!), apply to Merciless village today!
